Package il.ac.hit.Model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.hit.Model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDBSimpleActions, ISimpleActions
    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDBSimpleActions
    This class holds the methods which will be interacting with the db giving the program the ability to retrieve/update information in the db

    • Method Detail

      • addGrade

        public void addGrade​(CourseDetails courseDetails)
              throws DBActionsException
        adds CourseDetails object's values to the gpa table in the db. The CourseDetails argument was instantiated before and must hold all correct (not null) values.

        This method inserts object values via insert statement.

        Specified by:
        addGrade in interface ISimpleActions
        Parameters:
        courseDetails - an instantiated CourseDetails object holding the values of a course
        Throws:
        DBActionsException - if an sql exception occurred
        See Also:
        uses this method to connect to db

      • deleteGrade

        public void deleteGrade​(java.lang.String courseName)
                 throws DBActionsException
        deletes specific course from db table The String coursename must hold a correct name of the specific course we intend to delete.

        func establishes connection to db func deletes row from table via executeUpdate statement

        Specified by:
        deleteGrade in interface ISimpleActions
        Parameters:
        courseName - correct name of the course that would be deleted
        Throws:
        DBActionsException - if an sql exception occurred
        See Also:
        uses this method to connect to db

      • editGrade

        public void editGrade​(CourseDetails courseDetails)
               throws DBActionsException
        updates grades of a specific course in table The CourseDetails argument was instantiated before and must hold all correct (not null) values.

        func establishes connection to db func updates a specific course grades from table with new values via executeUpdate statement

        Specified by:

      • getGradeTable

        public java.util.List<CourseDetails> getGradeTable()
                                            throws DBActionsException
        returns a CourseDetails type list of all courses in table.

        func establishes connection to db retrieves course values from table via query into the CourseDetails object instantiation in the loop

      • getCourse

        public CourseDetails getCourse​(java.lang.String courseName)
                        throws DBActionsException
        returns a specific course from db table The String coursename must hold a correct name of the specific course we intend to retrieve.

        func establishes connection to db func retrieves a row from table via query with the corresponding courseName and instantiates a CourseDetails object with the retrieved values.

        Specified by:
        getCourse in interface IDBSimpleActions
        Parameters:
        courseName - correct name of the course that would be deleted
        Returns:
        values of a specific course
        Throws:
        DBActionsException - if an sql exception occurred
        See Also:
        uses this method to connect to db
